amendment.description: An amendment numbered 78 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to reduce funding for the National Labor Relations Board by $100 million, and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the National Labor Relations Board by $100 million, and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A030) Failed by recorded vote: 169 - 257 (Roll no. 661).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A030) Failed by recorded vote: 169 - 257 (Roll no. 661).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
